participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I am a party animal. My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I'm deathly afraid of heights. I own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient, expressive, and passionate about dance.
participant_2.background: Now I live in the United States. My aunt helped me escape when I was young. I was born in Somalia. I was forced to marry when I was a teenager. I like to dance.
